course_main_structural_unit.address:
Riia 23, ruumid 201, 205, 208, 303, 305, 306, 310
51010 Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: The course deals with both classical and modern biotechnology, including the principles of gene manipulation in prokaryotic and eukaryotic organisms and applications of recombinant DNA technology in microbial and eukaryotic systems in different areas from agriculture and industry to medicine.
description.et: Käsitletakse nii klassikalist kui ka kaasaegset biotehnoloogiat, s.h. geenide kloonimist, diagnostiliselt ja terapeutiliselt tähtsate valkude ekspressiooni ning transgeensete loomade ja taimede saamist.

objectives.en: The aim of biotechnology lecture course is to introduce methods of modern biotechnology and their application in science, technology and everyday life.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärk on tutvustada kaasaegse  biotehnoloogia meetodeid, nende erinevaid rakendusvõimalusi ja kohta tänapäeva maailmas

learning_outcomes.en: After the course, the students are expected:
To be familiar with the position of biotechnology in today's world
learning_outcomes.et: Omab ettekujutust biotehnoloogia kohast tänapäeva maailmas

learning_outcomes.en: To acquire the knowledge about main research methods in today's molecular biology and gene technology (enzymatic and chemical synthesis of DNA, DNA cloning, hybridization techniques, PCR, sequencing, directed mutagenesis and mutation analysis).
learning_outcomes.et: Omandab teadmised tänapäeva molekulaarbioloogia ja geenitehnoloogia põhilistest uurimismeetoditest (DNA ensümaatiline ja keemiline süntees, DNA kloonimine, hübridisatsioonitehnikad ja PCR, sekveneerimine, suunatud mutagenees ja mutatsioonanalüüs).

learning_outcomes.en: To be familiar with latest developments in the field of DNA and RNA research methods.
learning_outcomes.et: On tutvunud viimase aja arengutega DNA ja RNA uurimismeetodite vallas.

learning_outcomes.en: To be able to see relationships between different technologies and research methods
learning_outcomes.et: Oskab näha erinevate uurimismeetodite vahelisi seoseid.

learning_outcomes.en: To have overview about applications of classical biotechnology in industry, agriculture, environmental protection and medicine
learning_outcomes.et: Omab ülevaadet klassikalise biotehnoloogia rakendustest tööstuses, põllumajanduses, keskkonnakaitses ja meditsiinis.

learning_outcomes.en: To have overview about applications of molecular biotechnology in industry, agriculture, environmental protection and medicine
learning_outcomes.et: Omab ülevaadet molekulaarse biotehnoloogia rakendustest tööstuses, põllumajanduses keskkonnakaitses ja meditsiinis

independent_work.et: Oral presentation in seminar. Seminar topics will be distributed in lecture.

grade_preconditions.et: Positive results in both tests and oral presentation in a seminar

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

name.et: B.R. Glick and C.L. Patten “Molecular Biotechnology, Principles and Applications of Recombinant DNA” Sixth edition, 2022, ASM Press, Washington, D.C.
D.P. Clark and N.J. Pazdernik “Biotechnology: Applying the Genetic Revolution” Second edition 2016, Elsevier Academic Cell, Burlington, MA, USA

resources.mandatory_materials: B.R. Glick and C.L. Patten "Molecular Biotechnology - Principles and Applications of Recombinant DNA" 5th Edition ASM Press, Washington DC., 2017
resources.recommended_materials:
D.P. Clark and N.J. Pazdernik "Biotechnology - Applying the Genetic Revolution" 2nd Edition, Elsevier Academic Cell Print, London, 2016
W.J. Thiemann and M.A. Palladino "Introduction to Biotechnology" Fourth edition, Pearson Education Limited, New York, NY, 2020
